definitions.definition: A plant of the species Eutrema japonicum , cultivated for its edible root.
A pungent green Japanese condiment made from the plant Eutrema japonicum (syn. Wasabia japonica ).
An imitation of this condiment made from horseradish with green dye.

main_definition: A plant of the species Eutrema japonicum , cultivated for its edible root.
secondary_definitions: A pungent green Japanese condiment made from the plant Eutrema japonicum (syn. Wasabia japonica ).
An imitation of this condiment made from horseradish with green dye.
